byline: Dan Weissmann, D Gorenstein, David Brancaccio, Tracey Samuelson and Bruce Johnson
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, March 18, 2015
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, March 18, 2015
description: Airing on Wednesday, March 18, 2015: We're set to get the latest read today on when the Federal Reserve will hike interest rates. It may sound counter-intuitive, but rising interest rates may be a boon for the housing market. Plus: The EU is looking to make European governments exchange information about tax arrangements with multi-national companies, making "sweetheart deals" and tax incentives more difficult. Finally, the latest dispatch from the Marketplace Tech team down at SXSW. Privacy was the big theme at Austin's massive technology gathering in 2014. This year, it's anonymity.
